label: logicB:robotics_en
steps: [1] If the main power is on, the motor drives are enabled.
[2] If the motor drives are enabled, the robot can move.
[3] For every actuator x, if x is homed, then x has a known pose.
[4] If the robot can move and arm_1 has a known pose, then the planned motion can be executed.
[7] The robot can move and arm_1 has a known pose (from [1â€“3],[5],[6]).
[8] The planned motion can be executed (from [4] and [7]).
